I will wash and treat your wounds.
I-I am definitely not going to overpower him!
You said your eyes were stinging from the shampoo, did not you?
Make sure you wash it all off!
Since I am a kid, my arms are not long enough!
If my arms were long enough, I could poke his eyes out and run!
The characters, groups, places, laws, and names used in this program have no connection to any existing in real life.
If I do this, it will take longer for the tub to drain
so you will able to breathe.
About five to ten minutes, perhaps?
I will put an end to you right now.
This is what it means to be utterly helpless, Polnareff.
A-An adult would never be shameless enough to do this!
I could not use my arms or legs,
but I still let one out!
D-Do not you have any decency as a human being?!
A main character would never even think about doing that!
That is not good at all!
What did you do with the lady?
What do you think I did?
We should both watch our step, Polnareff.
We might accidentally step on her and kill her.
Set's shadow, will grow younger and younger.
Polnareff, you noticed the attack in an instant and managed
to jump away, so you ended up about seven or eight years old.
But she was in contact with it for a number of seconds,
so she reverted to a fetus.
but since she is not in her mother's womb, she will indeed die.
She is going through this because she tried to take care of you.
You are going to grow younger again.
I would say you are going to be around four years old this time, Polnareff.
I have to hurry up and beat him, or the lady will...
At this rate, the lady will die in a matter of minutes.
I have to do something to beat that old creeper as soon as I can!
She treated my wounds and was so nice to me...
I have to do something, fast!
Why are you running around cradling that dying fetus?
I will just do the same to you!
I just touched the shadow again!
Now I have achieved total victory!
You must be about three years old now.
Your mind will soon revert to a three-years-old's, too.
Locking the door will not do any good!
The bars are too close together.
Even if I am a kid...
I will not be able to get out through the window.
Looks like your precious Chariot's about three years old now, too.
He cannot cut through the bars,
Did he manage to somehow squeeze through these bars and go outside?
That bastard Polnareff is trying to trick me.
He wanted me to think that he got through the bars,
but he is probably hiding somewhere nearby, waiting to get the drop on me.
Very impressive for a brat, in fact.
At his small size, he could probably fit in that drawer.
He is probably hiding in the bucket or the drawer...
No, he could even be in the stuffed animal.
I have got a one-in-three chance.
I will try to get it on my first guess.
I will smash this axe into your brain on my first try!
That stuffed animal looks the most suspicious!
Or that is just what I want you to think,
and then I go for the clock that I had not mentioned yet!
Let us go for the bucket!
So it is the stuffed animal!
The walls and ceiling are made of stone.
Even if they were one centimeter thick, that Chariot could not dig through.
And I know he would not be able to make it through the bars.
You are going to lose to a kid in a battle of wits?
I was in the goldfish tank, using the mirror!
Even a kid could figure out that simple trick!
Old Man Alessi, you stupid creeper!
Even if he is only two, Chariot can still cut up your face!
I will keep attacking with my Stand until he gets too young to use!
He is going to kill me!
It is not very normal to come falling out a window all bloody.
At times like this, the one who stays calm wins.
Jotaro must be looking for an adult Polnareff,
and does not know about me.
I will just play dumb like I usually do...
The owner of this house is going to be so mad at me!
I was cleaning the window and slipped!
What am I going to do?
What am I going to do?
He is going to be so mad!
Hold it, you shitty old man!
I was waiting for Polnareff to show his face!
You have fallen under my Set's spell, too!
That guy's going to turn into a kid, too!
I heard that you only recently learned to use your Stand, Star Platinum.
Which means you were not able to use your Stand as a child!
You are just going to turn into a normal kid!
Lord Dio, I will be the one who kills Jotaro!
You are going to pay me royally for this!
Do not underestimate me just because I am a kid.
E-Even as a child, when Jotaro's serious...
Time to make doubly sure he is finished!
The Stand User of Set, God of Destruction and Storms, Alessi

For some reason, my body could not move...
I could not move a muscle, but I remember.
That boy was trying his best to protect me...
He was fighting an adult man.
Where did that very brave and manly boy go?
Where did my little knight go?
She was such a nice and wonderful lady.
I turned back to normal, but I wonder if she is okay.
Did you happen to see a little boy leave my house?
He has silver hair, just like you.
Pardon me for asking, but have we met before?
N-No... I-I did not see any kid.
There is no way we could have.
The two of us are travelers.
This is the first time I have been here, and I already have to get going
So it must have been a dream after all.
I told you two not to wander off on your own.
You are the ones who disappeared!
Let us go get something to eat.
Let me clear that away for you.
Finally, we can relax a little.
What should have been our breakfast became lunch.
We have got to figure out where Dio is hiding.
But we have gotten close, so it should be quite accurate.
This is the place we have to find!
You are the one who fell for the scam.
If he does anything even remotely strange...
You can go home if you are scared.
